lead_paragraph: An article in some editions last Sunday about the University of Connecticut’s 88-74 victory over Texas in men’s basketball on Saturday, Jan. 23, misstated, in some copies, the given name of the Huskies’ senior guard who scored 32 points. He is Jerome Dyson, not Eric. The article also quoted incorrectly from comments by George Blaney, UConn’s associate head coach. Blaney said, “Jerome moves in straight lines, no matter where he is on the court. ” He did not refer to the player as Eric.
